title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 51 - Prohibition Of Examination Of Livestock By Unqualified Persons At Livestock Auction Markets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 51 - Prohibition Of Examination Of Livestock By Unqualified Persons At Livestock Auction Markets

State Regulations
§ 51.1 - Prohibition of examination of livestock by unqualified persons at livestock auction markets

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 51

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 18[6], 74

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
